item.title: python 的 xmlrpc 简单用法
item.description: 1 服务端 from xmlrpc.server import SimpleXMLRPCServer QUIT_SERVER = False def is_even(n): return n % 2 == 0 def kill(): global QUIT_SERVER QUIT_SERVER = True return 1 def main(): server = SimpleXMLRPCServer(("localhost", 8000)) print("Listening on port 8000...") server.register_function(is_even, "is_even") server.register_function(kill, "kill") global QUIT_SERVER while not QUIT_SERVER: server.handle_request() if __name__ == '__main__': main() 2 客户端 import xmlrpc.client with xmlrpc.client.ServerProxy("http://localhost:8000/") as proxy: print("3 is even: %s" % str(proxy.is_even(3))) print(proxy.kill())
